long_description: The Arc'teryx Ceva jacket is a versatile, lightweight insulated jacket designed to be worn as either a cold weather mid layer or as a stand-alone piece in cold, dry conditions. Moisture- and wind-resistant mini ripstop outer fabric; 80g Coreloft(TM) synthetic insulation is breathable, compressible and lightweight. Inset panels of stretch fabric under the arms stop just above the hip for extended range of motion without compromising warmth. Smooth inner face-fabric allows for easy layering; non-quilted, laminated construction eliminates cold spots. Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Full front zip with insulated windflap; microsuede-lined collar and chin guard enhance comfort. Stretch wrist gussets and dropped drawcord hem maximize protection. Anatomic shaping ensures a comfortable fit; articulated patterning enhances mobility. Hand pockets have hidden zippers; includes an internal chest pocket. Arc'teryx Ceva jacket has a trim fit.
short_description: The Arc'teryx Ceva jacket is a versatile, lightweight insulated jacket designed to be worn as either a cold weather mid layer or as a stand-alone piece in cold, dry conditions.
